channel.title: Public static void objectExists?

item.title: Public static void objectExists?
item.dc:creator: @Bman1019 Bman1019
item.description:
@Bman1019 wrote:

ok heres my problem. im trying to make mining where when a set number of ores run out the rock disappears.

here is how it would be used

[code]
if(objectID == 2096) {
mine(blah, blah, blah);
miningId = objectID;
miningX = objectX;
miningY = objectY;
}

public void mine(int ore, int xp, int amount) {
if(objectExists(miningId, miningX, miningY) {
//do whatever;
}
amountâ€“;
if(amount <= 0) {
deleteObject(miningX, miningY);
}
}[/code]

i can make the other voids, i just need something that would work as objectExists to

i no in itemhandler there is a void called ItemExists for picking up items, but i tryed to modify it for objecthandler. it didnt work because everything in object handler at been scrapped and it really didnt change anything so i removed it

it doesnt matter what source im using, cause its pretty much custom, but the original was based on devo 6.0

Read full topic
